doc.field: Includes the German pamphlet "Es Muss Alles Anders Werden" (Everything Has to be Different), multiple issues of the publications Foreign Policy Reports and Foreign Policy Bulletin from the Foreign Policy Association, Inc, a long cable from Alex Murray Jr. regarding Communism in Costa Rica, and a project proposal from Richard Saunders for a documentary photographic study of the causes of current unrest and mass migration in the British West Indies. Correspondents include Elliot E. Cohen, Robert Warshow, Richardson Wood, Arthur Francis Joy, Mary Elizabeth Barber, Robert S. Henry (VP of the Association of American Railroads), George W. Whitaker, George Tichenor, John G. Rohrbach, Charles W. Tobey, Frederick S. Moseley, Jr., F. Peavey Heffelfinger, Rodney H. Smith, and Brooks Emeny.
Series VI. Allen Grover Files >> Matters Attended To (2 folders)
